description:
***New Course Launched March 18th with Already 700+ Students Happily Enrolled***

ACTUAL STUDENT REVIEWS

"This course will improve your winrate if you have already started working on a foundation of poker knowledge. This course touches up on things like squeezing, constructing 3bet ranges, how to conduct a hand review, and tips for moving up in stakes. I took three of Alton's poker courses while playing 5nl almost a year ago. Since then I have used the knowledge from these courses to get to 200nl. If you want to move up from the microstakes this course if for you." - Aaron

"Good, solid poker advice" - Mark

LEARN TO CONQUER THE MICRO STAKES JUST LIKE ME

Are you a good micro stakes poker player looking to conquer the micro stakes? Do you want to move up in stakes and escape the micro stakes?

If so, this course is for you!

This course will teach your intermediate and advanced No Limit Hold’em poker strategies you need to know to conquer the micro stakes!

You’ll learn the intermediate and advanced strategies you need to master and escape the micro stakes!

I have won over $1,000 at the micro stakes playing $5nl and $10nl micro stakes cash games in my spare time…

Building up a $5nl bankroll to a $25nl bankroll numerous times over…

At a 12BB/100 win rate…

And I'm going to show you how to do so as well!

BECOME A MASTER OF MICRO STAKES ONLINE POKER

In this course you'll learn everything you need to know to conquer the micro stakes and move up to higher stakes:

  • Master Range-Based Thinking to become an effective hand reader
  • Learn Combinatorics to bring your hand reading game to the next level
  • Understand the importance of Widening your Ranges
  • Learn to Steal and Defend more
  • Master the Squeeze Play, Isolation Raising and Floating
  • Learn the Art & Science of the Polarized 3-Betting Ranges
  • Learn to Bluff with a Purpose
  • Learn to Capitalize on Dead Money
  • Learn to utilize Hand History Reviews to improve your game
  • Learn effective strategies for Moving Up in Stakes

WHAT YOU WILL GET OUT OF THIS COURSE

Once you complete this course, you will be a fierce adversary and feared opponent at the poker table and will easily be able to crush micro stakes online poker.

You will not only win a lot more money at the poker tables, but you'll have a HUGE edge over your fellow micro stakes opponents!

Most importantly, you will be a much happier poker player as you see your profits skyrocket and as you move up in stakes throughout the year!

SO WHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR?

ENROLL TODAY, YOUR 100% RISK-FREE ENROLLMENT IS BACKED BY UDEMY'S 30-DAY, NO QUESTIONS ASKED, MONEY BACK GUARANTEE!

TO PREVIEW SELECT LECTURES FROM THIS COURSE, JUST SCROLL DOWN BELOW AND CLICK THE BLUE PREVIEW BUTTONS.
title: Conquer Micro Stakes Poker: Serious Poker for Good Players
